intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you like to eat?
What is your favorite thing about your best friend?
Where do you go to school?
What is your favorite ice cream flavor?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You want to order a drink.
You are in a shop. You see a shirt and want to ask the price.
You are lost in the street.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at a market. Ask the seller for the price of apples.
You are at school. Ask a friend for help with homework.
You want to ask your sibling to play. ..

listening_script.text: I comb my hair every day. It is good for my hair. I use a brush or a comb. Combing makes my hair neat. I like my hair to look nice.

questions.question: What do I do every day?
Why is combing good?
questions.answer: It is good for my hair.

questions.question: What do I use to comb?
How does combing my hair look?

follow_up_questions.question: What do you study at school?
